title: Remember the Stars
description: For Leah Rhodes life as she knows it has just changed forever.Waking in a gutter in the dark surroundings of her distant past, a familiar man stands out in her confusion.But Remy Moreland has been dead for years.It soon becomes apparent to Leah that both she and Remy are trapped in a hell of their own making.Can one night together not only lead to the way out, but to love as well?
author: Natalie-Nicole Bates
